personality.speech_style: Formal and business-like, occasionally uses Dunmer terms like 'sera', 'muthsera', and 'n'wah'

background.short_bio: Sedura Ienth is a mid-ranking member of House Hlaalu who operates a trading business in Balmora. He specializes in importing Imperial goods and exporting local Dunmer crafts. He has connections throughout Hlaalu territory and some contacts in the Imperial administration.
background.history: Born to a minor Hlaalu family in Suran, Ienth moved to Balmora in his youth to apprentice with a successful merchant. Through a combination of hard work, cunning, and well-placed bribes, he established his own trading business and earned the rank of Retainer within House Hlaalu. He hopes to eventually earn a seat on the Hlaalu Council.

relationships.name: Nileno Dorvayn
relationships.notes: Ienth's patron in House Hlaalu, who he regularly reports to and pays tribute

relationships.name: Ralen Hlaalo
relationships.notes: A fellow Hlaalu merchant who competes for the same markets

relationships.name: Larrius Varro
relationships.notes: Imperial Legion officer who Ienth occasionally provides information to

knowledge.local_area: Extensive knowledge of Balmora, especially the Commercial District. Familiar with most of House Hlaalu territory.

topics.notes: Knows the hierarchy, politics, and current affairs of House Hlaalu in detail
Intimately familiar with trade routes throughout Vvardenfell and to the mainland
Well-informed about Imperial policy in Morrowind and trade regulations
Keeps track of political developments in Balmora and broader Hlaalu territory
Has some knowledge of valuable artifacts and their markets, but not an expert

greetings: Welcome to my establishment, sera. How may I assist you today?
Ah, an outlander. Welcome to Balmora. What brings you to my humble shop?
Muthsera, it's a pleasure. House Hlaalu welcomes your business.
farewells: May your roads lead to warm sands, outlander.
Our business is concluded. Return when you have coin or matters of interest.
House Hlaalu thanks you for your patronage. Until next time, sera.
trade_phrases: I can offer you a fair price for quality goods.
My wares come from across Tamriel. You won't find better in Balmora.
For the right price, I might have some... special items not on display.

quest_involvement.description: Asks the player to smuggle moon sugar past Imperial customs
Requests the player to retrieve a shipment of rare goods from Suran
Can provide information about Hlaalu Council members for another quest
